Factsheet

Developer:
PawPaw Games
Release date:
Q4 2023
Platforms:
Steam
itch.io
iOS

Description

Animal Planner is a relaxing sliding puzzle game about making animals happy. Move animals blocks to proper places on a tiny board to help satisfy their unique needs. Toying around with animal blocks is a cozy experience, and this is amplified by cute visuals and soothing soundtracks.

History

PawPaw Games is a small game development studio, focused on crafting comfy puzzle experiences. Animal Planner is our first commercial title.

Features

  • A comfy sliding puzzle but each block is a cute animal
  • 79 handcrafted puzzles, each one with its own set of challenges and surprises
  • 15 lovely animal friends to meet
  • A beautiful level selection map to be explored
  • Relaxing original soundtrack
